title: Ancient Disses, Modern Trolls
paragraph:
Shalom friends,
As we find ourselves locked in digital battle in our comments sections with racists, antisemites, and fascists, let's turn to the wisdom of the Talmudic sages for some inspo. Welcome to "Ancient Disses, Modern Trolls."

title: Miriam and Geo Learn: Bava Batra 3 & 4
paragraph: Shalom friends! On Fridays, my chevruta Geo Poor & I do #dafyomi together. Watch this real-time #DafReactions video, as we learn and react to #BavaBatra 3 & 4. We were NOT READY. Find out why! If you dare! CONTENT WARNINGS! ALL OF THEM! â˜ ï¸ğŸ¯ğŸ˜±ğŸ¤®

title: Learning Talmud With Pardes!!!
paragraph: Shalom, friends! Behind-the-scenes: I got to learn an EPIC upcoming daf (Nedarim 66) with the @PardesInstituteofJewishStudies! Watch this video now, check out the amazing programs Pardes has to offer, and be sure to watch the #DafReactions video for Nedarim 66 when it drops!! #Talmud #DafYomi #JewishLearning
